alert.note: Alert for Baltimore City (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 16 at 4:57PM EDT until July 16 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of northern Maryland, including the following county: Baltimore and Baltimore City. * WHEN...Until 630 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 457 PM EDT, local law enforcement reported high water on several roads in Baltimore. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Baltimore... Pikesville... Towson... Catonsville... Woodlawn... Randallstown... Parkville... Owings Mills... Eldersburg... Milford Mill... Reisterstown... Lochearn... Arbutus... Mays Chapel... Lutherville-Timonium... Garrison... Lutherville... Stevenson... Mcdonogh... Brooklandville... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
